chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
L: Language
M: Model

Goal:
forall (v1 v2 : nat -> U M) (t : Term L), (forall x : nat, In x (freeVarTerm L t) -> v1 x = v2 x) -> interpTerm v1 t = interpTerm v2 t

Premises:
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, Fin.t (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Fin.t (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
freeVarTerm : forall L : Language, Term L -> list nat
U = fun m : Model => let (U, _, _) := m in U : Model -> Set
interpTerm = fix interpTerm (value : nat -> U M) (t : Term L) {struct t} : U M := match t with | @var _ v => value v | @apply _ f ts => interpTerms (arity L (inr f)) (func M f) value ts end with interpTerms (m : nat) (f : naryFunc (U M) m) (value : nat -> U M) (ts : Terms L m) {struct ts} : U M := match ts in (Terms _ n) return (naryFunc (U M) n -> U M) with | @Tnil _ => fun f0 : naryFunc (U M) 0 => f0 | @Tcons _ m0 t ts0 => fun f0 : naryFunc (U M) (S m0) => interpTerms m0 (f0 (interpTerm value t)) value ts0 end f for interpTerm : (nat -> U M) -> Term L -> U M
interpFormula = fix interpFormula (value : nat -> U M) (f : Formula L) {struct f} : Prop := match f with | @equal _ t s => interpTerm value t = interpTerm value s | @atomic _ r ts => interpRels (arity L (inl r)) (rel M r) value ts | @impH _ A B => interpFormula value A -> interpFormula value B | @notH _ A => interpFormula value A -> False | @forallH _ v A => forall x : U M, interpFormula (updateValue value v x) A end : (nat -> U M) -> Formula L -> Prop Arguments interpFormula _%function_scope
updateValue = fun (value : nat -> U M) (n : nat) (v : U M) (x : nat) => if Nat.eq_dec n x then v else value x : (nat -> U M) -> nat -> U M -> nat -> U M Arguments updateValue _%function_scope _%nat_scope _ _%nat_scope
Term_Terms_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : Term L -> Prop) (P0 : forall n : nat, Terms L n -> Prop), (forall n : nat, P (var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : Term L), P t -> forall t0 : Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall t : Term L, P t
Term_Terms_rec_full : forall (L : Language) (P : Term L -> Set) (P0 : forall n : nat, Terms L n -> Set), (forall n : nat, P (var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : Term L), P t -> forall t0 : Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall t : Term L, P t
subTermVar2 : forall (L : Language) (v x : nat) (s : Term L), v <> x -> substituteTerm L (var L x) v s = var L x
Terms_Term_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : Term L -> Prop) (P0 : forall n : nat, Terms L n -> Prop), (forall n : nat, P (var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : Term L), P t -> forall t0 : Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : Terms L n), P0 n t
Terms_Term_rec_full : forall (L : Language) (P : Term L -> Set) (P0 : forall n : nat, Terms L n -> Set), (forall n : nat, P (var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : Term L), P t -> forall t0 : Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : Terms L n), P0 n t
Formula_depth_rec2_imp : forall (L : Language) (Q P : Formula L -> Set) (f1 : forall t t0 : Term L, Q (equal L t t0) -> P (equal L t t0)) (f2 : forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), Q (atomic L r t) -> P (atomic L r t)) (f3 : forall f : Formula L, (Q f -> P f) -> forall f0 : Formula L, (Q f0 -> P f0) -> Q (impH L f f0) -> P (impH L f f0)), (forall (f g : Formula L) (z1 z2 : Q f -> P f), (forall q : Q f, z1 q = z2 q) -> forall z3 z4 : Q g -> P g, (forall q : Q g, z3 q = z4 q) -> forall q : Q (impH L f g), f3 f z1 g z3 q = f3 f z2 g z...
interpTerms : forall m : nat, naryFunc (U M) m -> (nat -> U M) -> Terms L m -> U M
Term_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : Term L -> Prop), (forall n : nat, P (var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : Term L, P t
Term_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : Term L -> Type), (forall n : nat, P (var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : Term L, P t
Term_sind : forall (L : Language) (P : Term L -> SProp), (forall n : nat, P (var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : Term L, P t
Term_rec : forall (L : Language) (P : Term L -> Set), (forall n : nat, P (var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : Term L, P t
Formula_depth_rec2_not : forall (L : Language) (Q P : Formula L -> Set) (f1 : forall t t0 : Term L, Q (equal L t t0) -> P (equal L t t0)) (f2 : forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), Q (atomic L r t) -> P (atomic L r t)) (f3 : forall f : Formula L, (Q f -> P f) -> forall f0 : Formula L, (Q f0 -> P f0) -> Q (impH L f f0) -> P (impH L f f0)), (forall (f g : Formula L) (z1 z2 : Q f -> P f), (forall q : Q f, z1 q = z2 q) -> forall z3 z4 : Q g -> P g, (forall q : Q g, z3 q = z4 q) -> forall q : Q (impH L f g), f3 f z1 g z3 q = f3 f z2 g z...
Eqdep_dec.K_dec_set : forall A : Set, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall (x : A) (P : x = x -> Prop), P eq_refl -> forall p : x = x, P p
interpRels : forall m : nat, naryRel (U M) m -> (nat -> U M) -> Terms L m -> Prop
subFormulaForall2 : forall (L : Language) (f : Formula L) (x v : nat) (s : Term L), exists nv : nat, ~ In nv (freeVarTerm L s) /\ nv <> v /\ ~ In nv (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec x (freeVarFormula L f)) /\ substituteFormula L (forallH L x f) v s = (if Nat.eq_dec x v then forallH L x f else forallH L nv (substituteFormula L (substituteFormula L f x (var L nv)) v s))
subFormulaExist2 : forall (L : Language) (f : Formula L) (x v : nat) (s : Term L), exists nv : nat, ~ In nv (freeVarTerm L s) /\ nv <> v /\ ~ In nv (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec x (freeVarFormula L f)) /\ substituteFormula L (existH L x f) v s = (if Nat.eq_dec x v then existH L x f else existH L nv (substituteFormula L (substituteFormula L f x (var L nv)) v s))
Terms_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : forall n : nat, Terms L n -> Prop), P 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : Term L) (t0 : Terms L n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : Terms L n), P n t
Terms_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : forall n : nat, Terms L n -> Type), P 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : Term L) (t0 : Terms L n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : Terms L n), P n t
Terms_sind : forall (L : Language) (P : forall n : nat, Terms L n -> SProp), P 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : Term L) (t0 : Terms L n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : Terms L n), P n t
Formula_depth_rec2_forall : forall (L : Language) (Q P : Formula L -> Set) (f1 : forall t t0 : Term L, Q (equal L t t0) -> P (equal L t t0)) (f2 : forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), Q (atomic L r t) -> P (atomic L r t)) (f3 : forall f : Formula L, (Q f -> P f) -> forall f0 : Formula L, (Q f0 -> P f0) -> Q (impH L f f0) -> P (impH L f f0)), (forall (f g : Formula L) (z1 z2 : Q f -> P f), (forall q : Q f, z1 q = z2 q) -> forall z3 z4 : Q g -> P g, (forall q : Q g, z3 q = z4 q) -> forall q : Q (impH L f g), f3 f z1 g z3 q = f3 f z2 g...
find_some : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l : list A) (x : A), find f l = Some x -> In x l /\ f x = true
inj_right_pair2 : forall A : Set, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall (x : A) (P : A -> Set) (y y' : P x), existT P x y = existT P x y' -> y = y'
count_occ : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> list A -> A -> nat
nth_error_In : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (n : nat) (x : A), nth_error l n = Some x -> In x l
Formula_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : Formula L -> Type), (forall t t0 : Term L, P (equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : Formula L, P f2 -> P (impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : Formula L, P f2 -> P (notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : Formula L), P f3 -> P (forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : Formula L, P f4
Formula_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : Formula L -> Prop), (forall t t0 : Term L, P (equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : Formula L, P f2 -> P (impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : Formula L, P f2 -> P (notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : Formula L), P f3 -> P (forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : Formula L, P f4
Formula_sind : forall (L : Language) (P : Formula L -> SProp), (forall t t0 : Term L, P (equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : Formula L, P f2 -> P (impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : Formula L, P f2 -> P (notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : Formula L), P f3 -> P (forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : Formula L, P f4
Formula_depth_rec2 : forall (L : Language) (P : Formula L -> Set), (forall t t0 : Term L, P (equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f : Formula L, P f -> forall f0 : Formula L, P f0 -> P (impH L f f0)) -> (forall f : Formula L, P f -> P (notH L f)) -> (forall (v : nat) (a : Formula L), (forall b : Formula L, lt_depth L b (forallH L v a) -> P b) -> P (forallH L v a)) -> forall a : Formula L, P a
Formula_depth_rec2rec : forall (L : Language) (P : Formula L -> Set), (forall t t0 : Term L, P (equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f : Formula L, P f -> forall f0 : Formula L, P f0 -> P (impH L f f0)) -> (forall f : Formula L, P f -> P (notH L f)) -> (forall (v : nat) (a : Formula L), (forall b : Formula L, lt_depth L b (forallH L v a) -> P b) -> P (forallH L v a)) -> forall a : Formula L, (forall b : Formula L, lt_depth L b a -> P b) -> P a
remove : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> A -> list A -> list A
nodup : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> list A -> list A
term_dec : forall L : Language, language_decideable L -> forall x y : Term L, {x = y} + {x <> y}
in_dec : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall (a : A) (l : list A), {In a l} + {~ In a l}
subTermId : forall (L : Language) (t : Term L) (v : nat), substituteTerm L t v (var L v) = t
Record SORaddon (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle : R -> R -> Prop) (C : Type) (cO cI : C) (cplus ctimes cminus : C -> C -> C) (copp : C -> C) (ceqb cleb : C -> C -> bool) (phi : C -> R) (E : Type) (pow_phi : BinNums.N -> E) (rpow : R -> E -> R) : Prop := mk_SOR_addon { SORrm : ring_morph rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req cO cI cplus ctimes cminus copp ceqb phi; SORpower : power_theory rI rtimes req pow_phi rpow; SORcneqb_morph : forall x y : C, ceqb x y = false -> ~ req (phi x) (phi y); SORcleb_morph : forall x y : C, cleb...
subFormulaForall : forall (L : Language) (f : Formula L) (x v : nat) (s : Term L), let nv := newVar (v :: freeVarTerm L s ++ freeVarFormula L f) in substituteFormula L (forallH L x f) v s = (if Nat.eq_dec x v then forallH L x f else if in_dec Nat.eq_dec x (freeVarTerm L s) then forallH L nv (substituteFormula L (substituteFormula L f x (var L nv)) v s) else forallH L x (substituteFormula L f v s))
subFormulaExist : forall (L : Language) (f : Formula L) (x v : nat) (s : Term L), let nv := newVar (v :: freeVarTerm L s ++ freeVarFormula L f) in substituteFormula L (existH L x f) v s = (if Nat.eq_dec x v then existH L x f else if in_dec Nat.eq_dec x (freeVarTerm L s) then existH L nv (substituteFormula L (substituteFormula L f x (var L nv)) v s) else existH L x (substituteFormula L f v s))
nodup_In : forall (A : Type) (decA : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x : A), In x (nodup decA l) < -> In x l

```coq
intros v1 v2 t H. induction t using Term_ind.
- simpl. reflexivity.
- simpl. f_equal. induction ts.
  + reflexivity.
  + simpl. rewrite IHt. f_equal. apply H. simpl. apply in_or_app. right. apply in_eq.
Qed.
Qed.```

original: intros v1 v2 t H. induction t using Term_ind. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. f_equal. induction ts. + reflexivity. + simpl. rewrite IHt. f_equal. apply H. simpl. apply in_or_app. right. apply in_eq.
